text:
Roman Andreyevich Kartsev (, born Roman Antshelevich Katz (); 20 May 1939 – 2 October 2018) was a Russian actor and comedian. He was born in Odessa, Ukraine. He was known for his roles in "Heart of a Dog", "Promised Heaven", and in "Old Hags".
Kartsev died on 2 October 2018 in Moscow from cardiac arrest at the age of 79.
